alert.note: Alert for Fairfield; Franklin; Pickaway (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 28 at 4:16PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTHEASTERN FRANKLIN, WEST CENTRAL FAIRFIELD AND NORTHEASTERN PICKAWAY COUNTIES THROUGH 445 PM EDT... At 416 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located over Ashville, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Locations impacted include... Columbus, Canal Winchester, Groveport, Ashville, South Bloomfield, Obetz, Royalton, Lithopolis, Carroll, Blacklick Estates, Duvall, Slate Run Metro Park and Fairfield County Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
